item.title: LIVE! Shocking! Rajasthan HM defends lynch mob gau rakshaks
'If you sweat in peacetime, you don't bleed in wartime'
item.description: 'We have to work for our victories.''We have to offer a better alternative governance model.''Not just criticise the current government.''You have to build bridges, learn from what has gone wrong and create a party for all people.'

item.title: Expect fireworks despite long injury lists as IPL 10 takes off
item.description: A clutch of Indian stars led by India and Royal Challengers Bangalore captain Virat Kohli are either sidelined or ruled out of this edition of the tournament, lessening the wow factor of the IPL.

item.title: Who wore it better: Anushka or Deepika?
item.description: Same outfit, styled differently by celebs. Tell us who looked better.

item.title: PHOTOS: The incredibly odd world we live in!
item.description: We know it's mad, mad world and these images prove it!

item.title: 11 reasons why Priyanka is the perfect Baywatch girl
item.description: Desi girl Priyanka Chopra is all set to take Hollywood by storm with her debut film Baywatch.

item.title: Watching porn online? Google is watching you ;)
item.description: When you open 100 incognito windows on Google Chrome, a smiley or winky face appears.

item.title: Is India ready for a Poker Sports League?
item.description: Come May, the Deltin Royale, which boasts of the country's largest poker room, will play host to India's first Poker Sports League.

item.title: PIX: When actresses got pregnant on screen!
item.description: Kareena Kapoor is all set to play an expecting mum in Madhur Bhandarkar's Heroine.

item.title: Low-cost male contraceptive finds no takers
item.description: It could also ease the burden on the 225 million women in developing countries, says Ari Altstedter.
